Homepage_h_Learning_English_Online: Online English studies - the low-cost revolution of English studies
Homepage_P_The_i_fal_app: The i-fal app, is an Israeli blue-and-white venture that enables English lessons with a private teacher - one on one in Zoom, at attractive prices suitable for every pocket. Our goal is to enable quality learning with experienced professional teachers for all ages without affecting the daily routine, while optimally improving the English language in all areas: reading, writing, speaking, grammar, regular conversations, and more.
Homepage_P_ifal_is_an: We offer maximum value for the price - we have seen improvement already in the first weeks.
Homepage_h_Some_more_good: Some good reasons to learn English with us at i-fal:
Homepage_p_A_price_you: High availability of classes, all hours of the day, including weekends. Canceling or rescheduling a lesson is possible even on the same day - up to two hours prior to the lesson.
Homepage_p_In_the_i_fal: We offer monthly subscriptions that can be canceled at any time, without obligation. You can cancel the subscription through the app with just a click.
Homepage_sh_Weekly_daily: Maximum value for the minimum price
Homepage_p_A_daily_lesson: A price not found anywhere else! We offer a professional learning experience at an average cost of NIS 20 per lesson. As part of the features, you also receive: homework (for those who are interested), self-practice, level monitoring, grammar exercises, and more.
Homepage_p_The_teaching_staff: Here at i-fal, the quality of the teachers is essential to us and that's why we look for the best teachers for you, all of whom have an extensive experience in teaching English.
Homepage_p_Our_goal_is: Our goal is to enable students around the world to learn English (with a one-on-one teacher) in zoom classe and provide a platform that enables them to improve all speaking, reading and writing skills in English.
Homepage_p_Convenient_app_for: Convenient app for coordinating lessons and monitoring
Homepage_p_Practice_words_learned: Practice words learned in class through the app
Choose_the_package_that_is_right_for_you: Choose the package that is right for you:
One_video_is_worth_about: One video is worth about 1,000 words!

NewLandingPage.helloFirst: Hi, Welcome to IFAL English online app - English lessons through online conversations.
NewLandingPage.howToBegin:
How to begin?
First, choose a teacher on the main screen
Choose a date and time for your preferred schedule and
select 'To set a lesson.'
Click 'To set a lesson'
NewLandingPage.deserveThird:
You deserve a first class for free - credit or payment details are not required.
Can't wait to meet you! Ifal team
NewLandingPage.toSetforth: To set a 20 minute FREE trial class without the need for your credit card details, please choose a time that is convenient for you.

faq_question_2: 2. Does the subscription renew automatically every month?
faq_question_3: 3. Is the app also suitable for low levels of English?
faq_question_4: 4. I don't feel comfortable with my level, how will I be able to speak for 25 minutes straight in English only?
faq_question_5: 5. At what level are the teachers in the app?
faq_question_6: 6. What about their accent? Do they have a strong accent?
faq_question_7: 7. Is it possible to schedule a lesson day after day with the same teacher?
faq_question_9: 9. Does the teacher send homework or notes?
faq_question_10: 10. If I registered and paid on 09/10, when will the future charge be reduced? How long am I committed to this package?
faq_answer_1: Payment is very simple - through our app/website, using a credit card. It is also possible to pay via PayPal. You can cancel the renewal of the subscription at any point in time.
faq_answer_2: Yes, the subscription renews within 30 days of purchasing the subscription and it can be canceled with a click through the app.
faq_answer_3: Of course! Our classes are suitable for everyone at all levels, and we have qualified teachers to teach starting from the basics - even if your level is low, you will be able to see an improvement already in your first lessons.
faq_answer_4: Our teachers are qualified to lead the conversation and know how to make the student feel comfortable at the beginning of the lesson, so there is no reason to worry.
faq_answer_5: Our teachers are carefully selected and go through several interviews and class demonstrations before they start working in the app. This is a very high level of English, all of them have many years of experience - you can schedule a trial class without obligation and be impressed by them.
faq_answer_6: Our teachers pay attention to correct spelling and speak clearly - this is one of the criteria we adhere to when choosing teachers through interviews, so that you can understand them and have good conversations.
faq_answer_7: of course! You choose the teacher - you can also study day after day, with the same teacher.
faq_answer_8: Lessons can be scheduled at any given time through our app/website! We have classes throughout the day, until the late hours: morning, noon and evening. Even on weekends.
faq_answer_9: Yes, at the end of each lesson the teacher sends a detailed lesson report by email, on the website and in the app with notes from the lesson, homework, new words learned, wrong sentences said, and how to say it correctly. You can practice the words through our website or app.
faq_answer_10: There is no commitment for a certain period. It is a Month-to-Month subscription basis and every 30 days from your initial registration’s date you will be charged for the new 30 days period. If you cancel the subscription any time within your 30 days period that you have already paid for, you won’t be charged on the next period and you will be able to use the subscription until the end of the period you have already paid for. For example: If you registered on 09/10 and you didn’t cancel the subscription thereafter, you will be charged for the new period on 09/11 but if you canceled the subscription prior to this date, you won’t be charged on 09.11 and the subscription will be over on 09/11.

info_title: How to access your lesson on an I-fal app?
cancellation_of_the_session_is_only_poss: Cancellation of the session is only possible 2 hours before the scheduled session starts.
Enter_6_digit_verification_code_we_just_: Enter 6 digit verification code we just send you through SMS to the number you specified.
Your_session_has_been_booked_with: Your session has been booked with
The_ifal_app_was_established: The i-fal app was established out of a real need to learn English with professional teachers and at attractive prices. Our goal is to enable students around the world to learn English (with a one-on-one teacher) in zoom classes and provide a latform that enables them to improve all speaking, reading and writing skills in English.
Download_the_app_now_and_get_a_first_les: To book a free trial class with no cost and obligation that lasts about 20 minutes without entering personal credit card information - click here and go immediately to the available schedules to book a trial class as a gift.
You_can_download_the_app_from_your_mobil: You can also book a free trial class via mobile (smartphone) by downloading the app:
The_grade_is_evaluated_by_the_teacher_du: The grade is evaluated by the teacher during the trial lesson.
ifal_automatically_increases_a_student: ifal automatically increases a student's score by 2 points in every lesson after the trial lesson since this is the average rate of progress for students.
In_the_6th_lesson_of_every_subscription: In the 6th lesson of every subscription (and before the subscription is renewed),the teacher will re-evalute the level and update the score manually (up or down) based on the student's actual progress.
We_will_send_you_a_notification_through:
* We will send you a notification through the I-fal app and by an email, 5 minutes prior to your lesson.
* Click on the reminder notification and it will transfer you to the lesson's page => There you will find the Zoom link.
* Click on that link and you will be transferred to the Zoom page, then just wait for your teacher to join.
** If you access your lesson from your smartphone (not a computer) it's important that you make sure to click on the button Call Over Internet' (located at the bottom of the Zoom call's screen) so the teacher can hear you.
Good luck!
I-fal Team.

about_page:
The i-fal application was established out of a real need to learn English with professional teachers and at attractive prices.
Our goal is to allow students around the world to learn English (with a one-on-one teacher) in Zoom classes and to provide a platform that allows improving all speaking, reading and writing skills in English.
ifal is an Israeli company - the principle that guides us is to provide the most for our customers' money and to provide results (the students will see an improvement in English from the first month).
Our passion for English and technology is what led us to develop the ifal app and is what allows us to continue to improve every day for our customers.
Our differentiation is value for money - English lessons with a one-on-one teacher at an average price of NIS 20 per lesson + an application shell with additional study options.
We are confident in our teachers, our service and the shared success and therefore are not afraid to work without a commitment period from our clients.
